"Face now the consequences of your actio: "Come, Magatsu. Hearken to the call of the Maiden of Ash. Our foe lies dead ahead!"
"Sukuna-hime!"
"Save thy concern! Magatsu and I are two halves once split from the will of this planet!"
"We are now neither good nor evil! We are merely the hand of god come to pass judgement! Judgement upon our enemy!"
"It is my duty to protect this planet! Magatsu, revel in thy rage and crush them!"
"Tch."
"So destroying that stone unleashed this god... I was played for quite the fool."
"Tcheh!"
"...However, you make light of me."
"You expect to subdue me with the power of but a single god?"
"Ngah!?"
"Hmh!"
"Graaah! ...Now there is no escape!"
"Yes, go!"
"I told you it was futile."
"I am the ruler of this universe. How could the god of but a single insignificant planet possibly compare?"
"Such irreverence is deserving of certain death."
"Ghaaah...!"
"An impressive toy indeed, though still naught but a toy. Now perish along with it."
"Sukuna-hime!"
"Hah... ahahahaha...!"
"Laughing, in the state you are in... Have you descended into lunacy?"
"To the contrary, I am filled with laughter at the thought of a god being made light of."
"Magatsu has felt your power clearly upon its body! It has been etched into its very soul! ...That is why!"
"Kotoshiro, now!"
"Understood!"
"By the energy inflicted... I call forth the Braided Ash Formation! Gather ash, and embody tranquility...!"
"Accept your defeat!"
"What?!"
"We are... evenly matched?! No... my strength has decreased?!"
"Correct you are, foul rogue! The Braided Ash Formation has been conjured here for that very purpose!"
"You disparaged us as a mere single planet... But do not belittle the power of a god, impudent child!"
"...I see. It seems I have been remiss. This power is an impediment to our cause."
"Therefore... I must personally see to its demise!"
"We won't let you!"
"Your time is up!"
